effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.x_y: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
